q: `` The last one we had was nasty. But this one doesn't hiss and we were able to walk it around. It was investigating and didn't snap at anyone,'' John Welsh said. We suspect that it's been someone's pet for a long time, because it's so big. I think they might let it wander around the house. Maybe it sleeps on a bean bag? Hills automaker until Chrysler repays its outstanding loans and holds a public stock offering, expected later this year. At that time, the two companies could be merged into one, Sergio Marchionne said. There is no difference operationally between the two companies, he said.`` From a corporate governance standpoint... separate companies don't make a lot of sense.'' But the companies have more work to do before they officially merge.``
